name: Lying Face
baseMeaning: A face with a long nose like Pinocchio, indicating lying.
tldr: Lying, not telling the truth, or calling out a lie.

contextMeanings.meaning: Calling someone or yourself out for lying.

platformNotes.note: Calling out lies or joking about one's own.
Used in 'tell me you're lying' content.

warnings.title: Can Be Accusatory
warnings.description: Using this to respond to someone implies they're lying.
